Text: Toxicity (song):  The song is predominately in triple meter, alternating between 6/4, 12/8 and 4/4 time.

Text: Toxicity (song):  The guitar during the verse plays in 6/4 using a 2+2+2 phrasing while the heavy part ("somewhere between the sacred silence and sleep") makes use of a hemiola with the guitar switching to a 3+3+3+3 pattern while the drums remain in compound duple meter until the bridge.
